p: Perhaps most challenging and a critical missing piece is collaborative, iterative design and refinement of indicators that can be used to monitor and evaluate performance of SESR framed VBD interventions. SESR-based monitoring and evaluation (M&E) methods and tools are needed. These must be capable of evaluating not only inputs-outputs and outcomes, but also processes (e.g. empowerment), behavioral change patterns and economic dimensions during and post VBD intervention. Several elaborate M&E frameworks have been or are being developed for climateÂ change adaptation and resilience [ 103]. Current efforts are underway to apply these to VBD interventions in Africa drylands and Southeast Asia (Ramirez, unpublished).
